about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a fullstack developer from Warsaw, passionate about clean code and practical development. I specialize in React, .NET and MongoDB. I currently work on a shopping center management system and build personal projects like a tenant turnover analytics platform. In my spare time, I explore cloud services (Oracle), DevOps, and system automation.
